content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: slime_block
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_scrap", "quantity": 63, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 32, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 9, "index": 20}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 9, "index": 22}, {"type": "tube_coral_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 16, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 26, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 10, "index": 42}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a slime_block, I need to place 9 slime_ball in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the slime_ball at slot 22 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
